phrases: Josuke, how long are you going to be playing that?
If you do not turn off that video game now,
I am going to shut it off myself.
Just let me play for five more minutes!
This is the most exciting part!
I will be a man who could not accomplish the one thing he set out to do,
and I will regret it the rest of my life!
the kicks are just going to get harder!
Do you really want your son to end up like that, Mom?!
How long can you put up with this?
Now, put that away and do your homework.
And take off your damn uniform when you are at home.
I will not be able to see you anymore.
I thought I turned it off.
I am thinking about leaving town.
And you want to forget about me?
Looks like Jotaro Kujo's not leaving town...
Even though I warned him all those times.
Well, what is the deal, Josuke Higashikata?
I have been stopping by here every now and then for a while now.
So this bastard's been watching me for a long time?
I have been frequently going to visit Okuyasu,
the younger brother of Keicho, whom I got rid of,
and I am very familiar with Koichi Hirose's Reverb and Yukako Yamagishi, as well.
And I know that Toshikazu Hazamada
and Tamami Kobayashi are both in the hospital.
What I am asking you is what are you actually doing in front of me,
when all this time you have been sneaking around like a gutless coward?
but you are not dumb enough to actually think you are going to kick my ass, are you?
I would never do anything that awful to you.
I am here to kill you painlessly.
I just cannot laugh at your sad excuse for a joke,
I told Jotaro this before, but Jotaro's Star Platinum is a menace to me.
It is the fact that Jotaro is too attentive
and the fact that Star Platinum has the power to stop time.
So I just wanted to see just how much stronger my Stand has gotten over time.
I thought I would test myself against you, Josuke Higashikata.
Until you can attack as quickly and precisely as Star Platinum, Josuke!
If you are that far away, your punches will be too weak.
I have just seen through your abilities.
Come closer and give me a super sharp one.
If you want to keep daydreaming,
maybe I will just help you sleep!
Jotaro's Star Platinum is nothing like this!
I got a little cocky and underestimated him.
What the hell is all that noise?
It felt like a jet engine going off...
He might just be stronger than Jotaro...
Looks like I am not the only one that is grown.
I will wait a little longer.
Until my Chili Pepper grows stronger, I will not be able to defeat Jotaro.
He can show up anywhere there is electricity.
Not only does he have tremendous power, but he can control his Stand remotely.
Josuke, I just asked you what all that noise was!
Man, a bug totally just bit me.
Sorry to keep you guys waiting.
What did you want to talk about, Josuke?
Why call us out to a lonely-looking place like this?
Could not we go to Tonio's or the usual cafe?
I am not the one who called you guys out here.
It is probably about Chili Pepper.
You mean the Stand, Chili Pepper?!
Why did not you let me know right away?!
He acts completely different when it comes to Chili Pepper.
I cannot blame him, since that Stand killed his brother, but...
I told Josuke to keep quiet.
Talking about him in the city, where there is electricity running, is dangerous.
I had you all come to this field so he would not hear us talking.
Okuyasu, Chili Pepper totally pisses me off, too.
He got into my house without me knowing.
He is free to listen to us talking and take whatever he wants.
Come to think of it, the homework I finished
the other day disappeared from my desk!
And I thought my mom mistook it for trash
That is not a big deal, Koichi!
What I am trying to say is that the only reason
Chili Pepper has not caused more trouble is that we are around,
and he drags people who piss him off into the phone lines
with about as much effort as someone making a pervy phone call.
Of course, he can use the bow and arrow,
and he may have already used it on someone.
I saw first-hand that he is gotten stronger.
We have to hurry up and find out who his user is.
We all gathered here to figure that out, right, Jotaro?
We will be able to find him.
Because the person who is capable
of finding him is arriving at Morioh Port at noon.
His Stand's name is Hermit Purple.
Only he is gotten way too old, so he does not have the strength to fight.
He used to be pretty ripped,
though you would not guess that now.
Well, his legs are weak, so he is using a cane.
He had surgery to remove gallstones two years ago,
and complains that he cannot eat T-bone steaks.
He is also starting to forget things.
You are not going to tell me his hobby is talking to mailboxes, are you?
I had you guys gather here in order to protect that old man.
If Chili Pepper finds out about him, he is probably going to kill him.
Because the thing Chili Pepper fears most is us finding out who his user is.
Yeah, but is a geezer like that really going to be useful to us?
but when he heard about the bow and arrow, he came to Japan on his own.
If he is 79, a foreigner, and a Stand user...
I heard you loud and clear.
How did he get to this field?
How to get there: From bus stop 1, take the bus for Morioh Grand Swimming Area and get off at the Morioh Grand Hotel stop.
From there, it is a 0-minute walk.
Located in the same area as many expensive villas, it is an elegant hotel full of history.
It has housed various travelers to Morioh and has been beloved for years.
The beef tongue served at the hotel restaurant is considered superb and is the talk of the town.
There are not any electrical lines here, so how?!
He must have hidden in the bike's battery and followed us here.
An old geezer Stand user who can find me?
I will be sure to kill that geezer the moment he arrives at the port!
Now he knows about the old man...
If we let him go, he is going to get to the old man before we do.
We need to throw a rock at that bike and destroy it!
For the sake of revenge, I, Okuyasu Nijimura,
I am the one who is going to deal with you.
at least in regards to you instantly transferring over here.
But the scratching motion you do with your The Hand
seems to stand no chance against Chili Pepper's swiftness.
Take a better look, you dumbass.
When I said I will scrape you away,
Now you will not be able to run away.
You actually used your head, Okuyasu.
Chili Pepper cannot go far from the bike's battery.
The nearest electrical line is at least a hundred meters away,
so you are as good as caught!
No, we have not actually caught him yet.
The bike battery is still there.
I am sure he plans to do whatever he can to kill Okuyasu and run.
Do you really think you have trapped me?
Are you trying to get revenge for Keicho?
I knew that someone would kill him someday.
When you keep doing stuff like that,
somewhere, somehow, it is going to come back and get you.
Even I can figure that out.
If I tell you, you will spare my life?
You are calmer than I thought.
I thought your insides were boiling from wanting revenge so badly.
Deep down inside, I hope you do not tell me!
I am dying to scrape you away so bad, you dumbass!
But you want to scrape me away?
With that pathetically slow right hand?
Should I laugh, or should I yawn?
I will make sure you know well
just how slow your Stand is!
I cannot stick around here for long.
I may have missed, but I still scraped through space-time,
Looks like you are getting quite a bit slower.
Are you going to be able to escape the next attack?
Chili Pepper's electrical sparkle is fading!
His Stand power must be running out!
Do not finish him off yet!
We have to ask him where the bow and arrow are right now.
Your Stand's right hand is slow as hell, but it is still a terrifying Stand.
Are you sure you do not want to finish me off?
Maybe I am just acting like I have grown weak, Okuyasu.
Maybe I am waiting for Jotaro to get closer so I can chop his head off.
What the hell are you talking about?
or wait for Jotaro to get here?
Why would you tell me that?
If he had not told me he was acting weaker,
he could have tricked me, and beaten me and Josuke by playing dirty...
Which means, uh, since he told me he is fine,
my chance of getting attacked is zero, right?
You are telling me to finish you off?!
I will leave that up to you.
Or is he lying about being weaker, and he is actually fine?
Are you coming or are not you?
If he is fine, I need to go in to finish him.
It is possible he is got something up his sleeve, too.
Hurry up and make up your mind, Okuyasu.
I cannot be bothered to think about which is right anymore, damn it!
Do not try and stop me, Jotaro!
I am going to finish this!
That is the only truth inside my heart!
Now finding the bow and arrow is going to be a real pain.
Though it looks like things were settled.
It looks like Chili Pepper really was plotting something.
He wanted me to dig this up!
The bike's battery is only a 12-volt.
Thanks to you, I feel alive again!
If you had only been a good little boy
and held back like Jotaro told you,
the battery would have died, and I would have been eliminated.
I know where all of the electrical lines in this city are.
I thought about running away using those cables,
but they were far from the bike.
I did not have the power to dig up the cables.
Which means the electricity from earlier, the electrical power,
Your big brother Keicho said you held him back.
You never could have gotten revenge, you dumbass!
I will have that geezer share the same fate as the Nijimura Brothers!
I cannot believe we had him cornered and he still got away.
He is a pretty dangerous Stand.
He can be controlled remotely, and in terms of power,
What are you guys talking about?!
he can take advantage of all the electrical companies, making his power infinite.
Why are you analyzing the enemy's abilities when Okuyasu just died?!
I guess we should worry about Okuyasu.
Looks like Okuyasu has really good luck.
Okuyasu was really lucky that his right arm was chopped off.
When I fix his arm, it means his body will come back.
I totally lost to that bastard.
It is not about revenge or winning or losing.
We have to think about protecting Joseph Joestar.
That will lead to us defeating Chili Pepper.
You have to do that for everyone.
For the place where we live...
We have to get to the old man's boat before Chili Pepper does.
Let us hurry to the port.
Are not you acting a bit too cool?
If we are going to the port, this way is closer.
You taught me a lesson, Chili Pepper.
We will be arriving at Morioh Port any moment now.
